# Custom plot 

```{r, echo = F, fig.align = "center"}
seqx <- seq(0,10, length = 100)
par(mypar)
par(bty = "l")
plot(seqx, cos(seqx), type = "l", lwd = 4)
abline(v = 6, h = 0, col = "#3fb3b2", lty = 2)
```
